LLM_Sentence: being the goat at two video game simulations of real-life activities (both of which have all but vanished outside of dave & busters and round1 arcades) is a pretty niche thing to devote your life to.
chike first tried ddr in 2005, after his older brother got him a copy of the game for his thirteenth birthday.
in fact, chike began collecting followers as soon as he started uploading videos of his performances online, under the username iamchris4life.

but chike has largely kept his on- and offline lives separate: everyone knows about his other life, including his frat brothers at upenn, but he hardly ever talks about his non-ddr life with his ddr friends, and visa versa.
clark recalled the song required about 800 steps at 220 beats per minute for two minutes, a feat of agility not entirely dissimilar to an olympic sprint.
